item.text: When Moses had completed setting up the tabernacle, he anointed it and consecrated it and all its furnishings, and he anointed and consecrated the altar and all its utensils.

Then the <st data-num="05387" class="">leaders</st> of <st data-num="03478" class="">Israel</st>, the <st data-num="07218" class="">heads</st> of their <st data-num="01004 01">clans</st>,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="07126" class="">made an offering</st>. <st data-num="01992" class="">They</st> were the <st data-num="05387" class="">leaders</st> of the <st data-num="04294" class="">tribes</st>; <st data-num="01992" class="">they</st> were the ones who had been <st data-num="05975 05921">supervising</st><n id="2" /> the <st data-num="06485" class="">numbering</st>.
They brought their offerings before the Lord, six covered carts and twelve oxen—one cart for every two of the leaders, and an ox for each one; and they presented them in front of the tabernacle.
Then the Lord spoke to Moses:
“Receive these gifts from them, that they may be used in doing the work of the tent of meeting; and you must give them to the Levites, to every man as his service requires.”
So Moses accepted the carts and the oxen and gave them to the Levites.

He <st data-num="05414" class="">gave</st> <st data-num="08147" class="">two</st> <st data-num="05699" class="">carts</st> and <st data-num="0702" class="">four</st> <st data-num="01241" class="">oxen</st> to the <st data-num="01121 01648">Gershonites</st>, <st data-num="06310" class="">as</st> their <st data-num="05656" class="">service</st> <st data-num="06310" class="">required</st>;

and he <st data-num="05414" class="">gave</st> <st data-num="0702" class="">four</st> <st data-num="05699" class="">carts</st> and <st data-num="08083" class="">eight</st> <st data-num="01241" class="">oxen</st> to the <st data-num="01121 04847">Merarites</st>, <st data-num="06310" class="">as</st> their <st data-num="05656" class="">service</st> <st data-num="06310" class="">required</st>, under the <st data-num="03027" class="">authority</st><n id="1" /> of <st data-num="0385" class="">Ithamar</st> <st data-num="01121" class="">son</st> of <st data-num="0175" class="">Aaron</st> the <st data-num="03548" class="">priest</st>.
But to the Kohathites he gave none, because the service of the holy things, which they carried on their shoulders, was their responsibility.
The leaders offered gifts for the dedication of the altar when it was anointed. And the leaders presented their offering before the altar.
For the Lord said to Moses, “They must present their offering, one leader for each day, for the dedication of the altar.”
The one who presented his offering on the first day was Nahshon son of Amminadab, from the tribe of Judah.

His <st data-num="07133" class="">offering</st> was <st data-num="0259" class="">one</st> <st data-num="03701" class="">silver</st> <st data-num="07086" class="">platter</st> <st data-num="04948" class="">weighing</st> <st data-num="07970 03967">130</st> shekels,<n id="1" /> and <st data-num="0259" class="">one</st> <st data-num="03701" class="">silver</st> <st data-num="04219" class="">sprinkling bowl</st> weighing <st data-num="07657" class="">70</st> <st data-num="08255" class="">shekels</st>, both according to the <st data-num="06944" class="">sanctuary</st> <st data-num="08255" class="">shekel</st>, <st data-num="08147" class="">each</st> of them <st data-num="04392" class="">full</st> of <st data-num="05560" class="">fine flour</st> <st data-num="01101" class="">mixed</st> with <st data-num="08081" class="">olive oil</st> as a <st data-num="04503" class="">grain offering</st>;

<st data-num="0259" class="">one</st> <st data-num="02091" class="">gold</st> <st data-num="03709" class="">pan</st> weighing <st data-num="06235" class="">10</st> shekels, <st data-num="04392" class="">full</st> of <st data-num="07004" class="">incense</st>;

<st data-num="0259" class="">one</st> <st data-num="01121 01241">young</st> <st data-num="06499" class="">bull</st>, <st data-num="0259" class="">one</st> <st data-num="0352" class="">ram</st>, and <st data-num="0259" class="">one</st> <st data-num="03532" class="">male lamb</st> <st data-num="01121 08141">in its first year</st>, for a <st data-num="05930" class="">burnt offering</st>;
<st data-num="0259" class="">one</st> <st data-num="08163" class="">male</st> <st data-num="05795" class="">goat</st> for a <st data-num="02403" class="">purification offering</st>;
and for the sacrifice of peace offerings: two bulls, five rams, five male goats, and five male lambs in their first year. This was the offering of Nahshon son of Amminadab.
On the second day Nethanel son of Zuar, leader of Issachar, presented an offering.

He <st data-num="07126" class="">offered</st> for his <st data-num="07133" class="">offering</st> <st data-num="0259" class="">one</st> <st data-num="03701" class="">silver</st> <st data-num="07086" class="">platter</st> <st data-num="04948" class="">weighing</st> <st data-num="07970 03967">130</st> shekels and <st data-num="0259" class="">one</st> <st data-num="03701" class="">silver</st> <st data-num="04219" class="">sprinkling bowl</st> weighing <st data-num="07657" class="">70</st> <st data-num="08255" class="">shekels</st>, both according to the <st data-num="06944" class="">sanctuary</st> <st data-num="08255" class="">shekel</st>, <st data-num="08147" class="">each</st> of them <st data-num="04392" class="">full</st> of <st data-num="05560" class="">fine flour</st> <st data-num="01101" class="">mixed</st> with <st data-num="08081" class="">olive oil</st> as a <st data-num="04503" class="">grain offering</st>;

<st data-num="0259" class="">one</st> <st data-num="02091" class="">gold</st> <st data-num="03709" class="">pan</st> weighing <st data-num="06235">10</st> shekels, <st data-num="04392" class="">full</st> of <st data-num="07004" class="">incense</st>;

<st data-num="0259" class="">one</st> <st data-num="01121 01241">young</st> <st data-num="06499" class="">bull</st>, <st data-num="0259" class="">one</st> <st data-num="0352" class="">ram</st>, and <st data-num="0259" class="">one</st> <st data-num="03532" class="">male lamb</st> <st data-num="01121 08141">in its first year</st>, for a <st data-num="05930" class="">burnt offering</st>;
<st data-num="0259" class="">one</st> <st data-num="08163" class="">male</st> <st data-num="05795" class="">goat</st> for a <st data-num="02403" class="">purification offering</st>;
and for the sacrifice of peace offerings: two bulls, five rams, five male goats, and five male lambs in their first year. This was the offering of Nethanel son of Zuar.
On the third day Eliab son of Helon, leader of the Zebulunites, presented an offering.

His <st data-num="07133" class="">offering</st> was <st data-num="0259" class="">one</st> <st data-num="03701" class="">silver</st> <st data-num="07086" class="">platter</st> <st data-num="04948" class="">weighing</st> <st data-num="07970 03967">130</st> shekels and <st data-num="0259" class="">one</st> <st data-num="03701" class="">silver</st> <st data-num="04219" class="">sprinkling bowl</st> weighing <st data-num="07657">70</st> <st data-num="08255" class="">shekels</st>, both according to the <st data-num="06944" class="">sanctuary</st> <st data-num="08255" class="">shekel</st>, <st data-num="08147" class="">each</st> of them <st data-num="04392" class="">full</st> of <st data-num="05560" class="">fine flour</st> <st data-num="01101" class="">mixed</st> with <st data-num="08081" class="">olive oil</st> as a <st data-num="04503" class="">grain offering</st>;

<st data-num="0259" class="">one</st> <st data-num="02091" class="">gold</st> <st data-num="03709" class="">pan</st> weighing <st data-num="06235">10</st> shekels, <st data-num="04392" class="">full</st> of <st data-num="07004" class="">incense</st>;

<st data-num="0259" class="">one</st> <st data-num="01121 01241">young</st> <st data-num="06499" class="">bull</st>, <st data-num="0259" class="">one</st> <st data-num="0352" class="">ram</st>, and <st data-num="0259" class="">one</st> <st data-num="03532" class="">male lamb</st> <st data-num="01121 08141">in its first year</st>, for a <st data-num="05930" class="">burnt offering</st>;
<st data-num="0259" class="">one</st> <st data-num="08163" class="">male</st> <st data-num="05795" class="">goat</st> for a <st data-num="02403" class="">purification offering</st>;
and for the sacrifice of peace offerings: two bulls, five rams, five male goats, and five male lambs in their first year. This was the offering of Eliab son of Helon.
On the fourth day Elizur son of Shedeur, leader of the Reubenites, presented an offering.

His <st data-num="07133" class="">offering</st> was <st data-num="0259" class="">one</st> <st data-num="03701" class="">silver</st> <st data-num="07086" class="">platter</st> <st data-num="04948" class="">weighing</st> <st data-num="07970 03967">130</st> shekels and <st data-num="0259" class="">one</st> <st data-num="03701" class="">silver</st> <st data-num="04219" class="">sprinkling bowl</st> weighing <st data-num="07657" class="">70</st> <st data-num="08255" class="">shekels</st>, both according to the <st data-num="06944" class="">sanctuary</st> <st data-num="08255" class="">shekel</st>, <st data-num="08147" class="">each</st> of them <st data-num="04392" class="">full</st> of <st data-num="05560" class="">fine flour</st> <st data-num="01101" class="">mixed</st> with <st data-num="08081" class="">olive oil</st> as a <st data-num="04503" class="">grain offering</st>;

<st data-num="0259" class="">one</st> <st data-num="02091" class="">gold</st> <st data-num="03709" class="">pan</st> weighing <st data-num="06235">10</st> shekels, <st data-num="04392" class="">full</st> of <st data-num="07004" class="">incense</st>;

<st data-num="0259" class="">one</st> <st data-num="01121 01241">young</st> <st data-num="06499" class="">bull</st>, <st data-num="0259" class="">one</st> <st data-num="0352" class="">ram</st>, and <st data-num="0259" class="">one</st> <st data-num="03532" class="">male lamb</st> <st data-num="01121 08141">in its first year</st>, for a <st data-num="05930" class="">burnt offering</st>;
<st data-num="0259" class="">one</st> <st data-num="08163" class="">male</st> <st data-num="05795" class="">goat</st> for a <st data-num="02403" class="">purification offering</st>;
and for the sacrifice of peace offerings: two bulls, five rams, five male goats, and five lambs in their first year. This was the offering of Elizur son of Shedeur.
On the fifth day Shelumiel son of Zurishaddai, leader of the Simeonites, presented an offering.

His <st data-num="07133" class="">offering</st> was <st data-num="0259" class="">one</st> <st data-num="03701" class="">silver</st> <st data-num="07086" class="">platter</st> <st data-num="04948" class="">weighing</st> <st data-num="07970 03967">130</st> shekels and <st data-num="0259" class="">one</st> <st data-num="03701" class="">silver</st> <st data-num="04219" class="">sprinkling bowl</st> weighing <st data-num="07657" class="">70</st> <st data-num="08255" class="">shekels</st>, both according to the <st data-num="06944" class="">sanctuary</st> <st data-num="08255" class="">shekel</st>, <st data-num="08147" class="">each</st> of them <st data-num="04392" class="">full</st> of <st data-num="05560" class="">fine flour</st> <st data-num="01101" class="">mixed</st> with <st data-num="08081" class="">olive oil</st> as a <st data-num="04503" class="">grain offering</st>;

<st data-num="0259" class="">one</st> <st data-num="01121 01241">young</st> <st data-num="06499" class="">bull</st>, <st data-num="0259" class="">one</st> <st data-num="0352" class="">ram</st>, and <st data-num="0259" class="">one</st> <st data-num="03532" class="">male lamb</st> <st data-num="01121 08141">in its first year</st>, for a <st data-num="05930" class="">burnt offering</st>;
<st data-num="0259" class="">one</st> <st data-num="08163" class="">male</st> <st data-num="05795" class="">goat</st> for a <st data-num="02403" class="">purification offering</st>;
and for the sacrifice of peace offerings: two bulls, five rams, five male goats, and five lambs in their first year. This was the offering of Shelumiel son of Zurishaddai.
On the sixth day Eliasaph son of Deuel, leader of the Gadites, presented an offering.

His <st data-num="07133" class="">offering</st> was <st data-num="0259" class="">one</st> <st data-num="03701" class="">silver</st> <st data-num="07086" class="">platter</st> <st data-num="04948" class="">weighing</st> <st data-num="07970 03967">130</st> shekels and <st data-num="0259" class="">one</st> <st data-num="03701" class="">silver</st> <st data-num="04219" class="">sprinkling bowl</st> weighing <st data-num="07657" class="">70</st> <st data-num="08255" class="">shekels</st>, both according to the <st data-num="06944" class="">sanctuary</st> <st data-num="08255" class="">shekel</st>, <st data-num="08147" class="">each</st> of them <st data-num="04392" class="">full</st> of <st data-num="05560" class="">fine flour</st> <st data-num="01101" class="">mixed</st> with <st data-num="08081" class="">olive oil</st> as a <st data-num="04503" class="">grain offering</st>;

<st data-num="0259" class="">one</st> <st data-num="08163" class="">male</st> <st data-num="05795" class="">goat</st> for a <st data-num="02403" class="">purification offering</st>;
and for the sacrifice of peace offerings: two bulls, five rams, five male goats, and five lambs in their first year. This was the offering of Eliasaph son of Deuel.
On the seventh day Elishama son of Ammihud, leader of the Ephraimites, presented an offering.

His <st data-num="07133" class="">offering</st> was <st data-num="0259" class="">one</st> <st data-num="03701" class="">silver</st> <st data-num="07086" class="">platter</st> <st data-num="04948" class="">weighing</st> <st data-num="07970 03967">130</st> shekels and <st data-num="0259" class="">one</st> <st data-num="03701" class="">silver</st> <st data-num="04219" class="">sprinkling bowl</st> weighing <st data-num="07657" class="">70</st> <st data-num="08255" class="">shekels</st>, both according to the <st data-num="06944" class="">sanctuary</st> <st data-num="08255" class="">shekel</st>, <st data-num="08147" class="">each</st> of them <st data-num="04392" class="">full</st> of <st data-num="05560" class="">fine flour</st> <st data-num="01101" class="">mixed</st> with <st data-num="08081" class="">olive oil</st> as a <st data-num="04503" class="">grain offering</st>;

and for the sacrifice of peace offerings: two bulls, five rams, five male goats, and five lambs in their first year. This was the offering of Elishama son of Ammihud.
On the eighth day Gamaliel son of Pedahzur, leader of the Manassehites, presented an offering.

His <st data-num="07133" class="">offering</st> was <st data-num="0259" class="">one</st> <st data-num="03701" class="">silver</st> <st data-num="07086" class="">platter</st> <st data-num="04948" class="">weighing</st> <st data-num="07970 03967">130</st> shekels and <st data-num="0259" class="">one</st> <st data-num="03701" class="">silver</st> <st data-num="04219" class="">sprinkling bowl</st> weighing <st data-num="07657" class="">70</st> <st data-num="08255" class="">shekels</st>, both according to the <st data-num="06944" class="">sanctuary</st> <st data-num="08255" class="">shekel</st>, <st data-num="08147" class="">each</st> of them <st data-num="04392" class="">full</st> of <st data-num="05560" class="">fine flour</st> <st data-num="01101" class="">mixed</st> with <st data-num="08081" class="">olive oil</st> as a <st data-num="04503" class="">grain offering</st>;

and for the sacrifice of peace offerings: two bulls, five rams, five male goats, and five lambs in their first year. This was the offering of Gamaliel son of Pedahzur.
On the ninth day Abidan son of Gideoni, leader of the Benjaminites, presented an offering.

His <st data-num="07133" class="">offering</st> was <st data-num="0259" class="">one</st> <st data-num="03701" class="">silver</st> <st data-num="07086" class="">platter</st> <st data-num="04948" class="">weighing</st> <st data-num="07970 03967">130</st> shekels and <st data-num="0259" class="">one</st> <st data-num="03701" class="">silver</st> <st data-num="04219" class="">sprinkling bowl</st> weighing <st data-num="07657" class="">70</st> <st data-num="08255" class="">shekels</st>, both according to the <st data-num="06944" class="">sanctuary</st> <st data-num="08255" class="">shekel</st>, <st data-num="08147" class="">each</st> of them <st data-num="04392" class="">full</st> of <st data-num="05560" class="">fine flour</st> <st data-num="01101" class="">mixed</st> with <st data-num="08081" class="">olive oil</st> as a <st data-num="04503" class="">grain offering</st>;

and for the sacrifice of peace offerings: two bulls, five rams, five male goats, and five lambs in their first year. This was the offering of Abidan son of Gideoni.
On the tenth day Ahiezer son of Ammishaddai, leader of the Danites, presented an offering.

His <st data-num="07133" class="">offering</st> was <st data-num="0259" class="">one</st> <st data-num="03701" class="">silver</st> <st data-num="07086" class="">platter</st> <st data-num="04948" class="">weighing</st> <st data-num="07970 03967">130</st> shekels and <st data-num="0259" class="">one</st> <st data-num="03701" class="">silver</st> <st data-num="04219" class="">sprinkling bowl</st> weighing <st data-num="07657" class="">70</st> <st data-num="08255" class="">shekels</st>, both according to the <st data-num="06944" class="">sanctuary</st> <st data-num="08255" class="">shekel</st>, <st data-num="08147" class="">each</st> of them <st data-num="04392" class="">full</st> of <st data-num="05560" class="">fine flour</st> <st data-num="01101" class="">mixed</st> with <st data-num="08081" class="">olive oil</st> as a <st data-num="04503" class="">grain offering</st>;

<st data-num="0259" class="">one</st> <st data-num="01121 01241">young</st> <st data-num="06499" class="">bull</st>, <st data-num="0259" class="">one</st> <st data-num="0352" class="">ram</st>, and <st data-num="0259" class="">one</st> <st data-num="03532" class="">male lamb</st> <st data-num="01121 08141">in its first year</st>, for a <st data-num="05930" class="">burnt offering</st>;
<st data-num="0259" class="">one</st> <st data-num="08163" class="">male</st> <st data-num="05795" class="">goat</st> for a <st data-num="02403" class="">purification offering</st>;
and for the sacrifice of peace offerings: two bulls, five rams, five male goats, and five lambs in their first year. This was the offering of Ahiezer son of Ammishaddai.
On the eleventh day Pagiel son of Ocran, leader of the Asherites, presented an offering.

His <st data-num="07133" class="">offering</st> was <st data-num="0259" class="">one</st> <st data-num="03701" class="">silver</st> <st data-num="07086" class="">platter</st> <st data-num="04948" class="">weighing</st> <st data-num="07970 03967">130</st> shekels and <st data-num="0259" class="">one</st> <st data-num="03701" class="">silver</st> <st data-num="04219" class="">sprinkling bowl</st> weighing <st data-num="07657" class="">70</st> <st data-num="08255" class="">shekels</st>, both according to the <st data-num="06944" class="">sanctuary</st> <st data-num="08255" class="">shekel</st>, <st data-num="08147" class="">each</st> of them <st data-num="04392" class="">full</st> of <st data-num="05560" class="">fine flour</st> <st data-num="01101" class="">mixed</st> with <st data-num="08081" class="">olive oil</st> as a <st data-num="04503" class="">grain offering</st>;

<st data-num="0259" class="">one</st> <st data-num="02091" class="">gold</st> <st data-num="03709" class="">pan</st> weighing <st data-num="06235" class="">10</st> shekels, <st data-num="04392" class="">full</st> of <st data-num="07004" class="">incense</st>;

<st data-num="0259" class="">one</st> <st data-num="01121 01241">young</st> <st data-num="06499" class="">bull</st>, <st data-num="0259" class="">one</st> <st data-num="0352" class="">ram</st>, and <st data-num="0259" class="">one</st> <st data-num="03532" class="">male lamb</st> <st data-num="01121 08141">in its first year</st>, for a <st data-num="05930" class="">burnt offering</st>;
<st data-num="0259" class="">one</st> <st data-num="08163" class="">male</st> <st data-num="05795" class="">goat</st> for a <st data-num="02403" class="">purification offering</st>;
and for the sacrifice of peace offerings: two bulls, five rams, five male goats, and five lambs in their first year. This was the offering of Pagiel son of Ocran.
On the twelfth day Ahira son of Enan, leader of the Naphtalites, presented an offering.

His <st data-num="07133" class="">offering</st> was <st data-num="0259" class="">one</st> <st data-num="03701" class="">silver</st> <st data-num="07086" class="">platter</st> <st data-num="04948" class="">weighing</st> <st data-num="07970 03967">130</st> shekels and <st data-num="0259" class="">one</st> <st data-num="03701" class="">silver</st> <st data-num="04219" class="">sprinkling bowl</st> weighing <st data-num="07657" class="">70</st> <st data-num="08255" class="">shekels</st>, both according to the <st data-num="06944" class="">sanctuary</st> <st data-num="08255" class="">shekel</st>, <st data-num="08147" class="">each</st> of them <st data-num="04392" class="">full</st> of <st data-num="05560" class="">fine flour</st> <st data-num="01101" class="">mixed</st> with <st data-num="08081" class="">olive oil</st> as a <st data-num="04503" class="">grain offering</st>;

<st data-num="0259" class="">one</st> <st data-num="02091" class="">gold</st> <st data-num="03709" class="">pan</st> weighing <st data-num="06235" class="">10</st> shekels, <st data-num="04392" class="">full</st> of <st data-num="07004" class="">incense</st>;

<st data-num="0259" class="">one</st> <st data-num="01121 01241">young</st> <st data-num="06499" class="">bull</st>, <st data-num="0259" class="">one</st> <st data-num="0352" class="">ram</st>, and <st data-num="0259" class="">one</st> <st data-num="03532" class="">male lamb</st> <st data-num="01121 08141">in its first year</st>, for a <st data-num="05930" class="">burnt offering</st>;
<st data-num="0259" class="">one</st> <st data-num="08163" class="">male</st> <st data-num="05795" class="">goat</st> for a <st data-num="02403" class="">purification offering</st>;
and for the sacrifice of peace offerings: two bulls, five rams, five male goats, and five lambs in their first year. This was the offering of Ahira son of Enan.
This was the dedication for the altar from the leaders of Israel, when it was anointed: twelve silver platters, twelve silver sprinkling bowls, and twelve gold pans.

<st data-num="0259" class="">Each</st> <st data-num="03701" class="">silver</st> <st data-num="07086" class="">platter</st> weighed <st data-num="07970 03967">130</st> shekels, and <st data-num="0259" class="">each</st> silver <st data-num="04219" class="">sprinkling bowl</st> weighed <st data-num="07657" class="">70</st> shekels. <st data-num="03605" class="">All</st> the <st data-num="03701" class="">silver</st> of the <st data-num="03627" class="">vessels</st> weighed <st data-num="0505 0702 03967">2,400</st> shekels, according to the <st data-num="06944" class="">sanctuary</st> <st data-num="08255" class="">shekel</st>.

The <st data-num="08147 06240">twelve</st> <st data-num="02091" class="">gold</st> <st data-num="03709" class="">pans</st> <st data-num="04392" class="">full</st> of <st data-num="07004" class="">incense</st> weighed <st data-num="06235" class="">10</st> shekels <st data-num="03709" class="">each</st>, according to the <st data-num="06944" class="">sanctuary</st> <st data-num="08255" class="">shekel</st>; <st data-num="03605" class="">all</st> the <st data-num="02091" class="">gold</st> of the <st data-num="03709" class="">pans</st> weighed <st data-num="06242 03967">120</st> shekels.

<st data-num="03605" class="">All</st> the <st data-num="01241" class="">animals</st> for the <st data-num="05930" class="">burnt offering</st> were <st data-num="08147 06240">12</st> <st data-num="06499" class="">young bulls</st>, <st data-num="08147 06240">12</st> <st data-num="0352" class="">rams</st>, <st data-num="08147 06240">12</st> <st data-num="03532" class="">male lambs</st> <st data-num="01121 08141">in their first year</st>, with their <st data-num="04503" class="">grain offering</st>, and <st data-num="08147 06240">12</st> <st data-num="08163" class="">male</st> <st data-num="05795" class="">goats</st> for a <st data-num="02403" class="">purification offering</st>.

All the animals for the sacrifice for the peace offering were 24 young bulls, 60 rams, 60 male goats, and 60 lambs in their first year. These were the dedication offerings for the altar after it was anointed.

Now when Moses went into the tent of meeting to speak with the Lord, he heard the voice speaking to him from above the atonement lid that was on the ark of the testimony, from between the two cherubim. Thus he spoke to him.
